St._Joseph.Washington Township, Buchanan County, Mi:
Washington Township is one of twelve townships in Buchanan County, Missouri, USA. As of the 2000 census, its population was 75,694.
Washington Township was established in 1842, and named after President George Washington.


== Geography ==
Washington Township covers an area of 82.24 square miles (213.0 km2) and contains one incorporated settlement, St.
